name: Astralia (Digital Bros Game Academy)
description:
Astralia is a project developed by our students during the 2021/22 academic year for TBO project in collaboration with AvantGarden Games.

● Elevator Pitch:

The distant planets of Astralia are leaving their star’s orbit, and soon they will crumble to dust. Astralia is a melee battle royale game where you have to fight for your life by jumping into the Hyper Gates across deadly planets.

● Key Features:

○ Shrinking planets: “Every weapon, health kit and resource you collect makes your planet smaller. Fight against your enemy and be the last one alive on it!”;

○ Unique Features: “The galaxy of Astralia is filled with unique planets that are home to hostile environments, extreme biomes, and deadly traps”;

○ Classes: “Team up with other players and prevail over your enemies. You will have various characters at your disposal, each with their own abilities and stats.”.
